info.title: MK Store Backend API
info.description: E-commerce application backend API documentation with sample requests and responses

bearerAuth.description: Enter JWT token obtained from login endpoints

400.description: Bad request - validation error or duplicate code

updatedBy.description: User ID who is updating the branch

409.description: Concurrency conflict - branch was modified by another user

post.summary: Get brands with pagination and filters

updatedBy.description: User ID who is updating the brand

productId.description: Product ID (required - must match variant's product)

variantId.description: Product variant ID (required - must belong to the specified product)

vendorId.description: Vendor ID (optional - will be validated against product's vendor)

branchId.description: Branch ID (optional - will be validated against product's branch)

400.description: Validation error or item already in cart

vendorId.description: Filter cart items by vendor ID (optional)

branchId.description: Filter cart items by branch ID (optional)

updatedBy.description: User ID who is updating the category

get.description: Simple test endpoint to verify API is working

quantityChange.description: Positive for increase, negative for decrease

notes.example: Stock adjustment due to damaged items

post.summary: Place a new order from cart items

branchId.description: Branch ID where order is placed (required - must belong to vendorId)

createdBy.description: User ID who is placing the order (optional, can be extracted from token)

addressId.description: Existing address ID (optional - if not provided, address fields must be provided)

houseNo.description: House number for new address (optional - required if addressId not provided)

streetDetails.description: Street details for new address (optional - required if addressId not provided)

landmark.description: Landmark for new address (optional - required if addressId not provided)

name.description: Name for delivery address (optional - required if addressId not provided)

mobileNumber.description: Mobile number for delivery address (optional - required if addressId not provided)

offerCode.description: Offer code to apply discount (optional - cannot be used with promocodeId)

promocodeId.description: Promo code ID to apply discount (optional - cannot be used with offerCode)

orderPriority.description: Order priority level (optional, defaults to NORMAL)

400.description: Validation error or business logic error

error.example: Cannot apply both offer code and promo code. Please choose one.

post.summary: Get user orders with pagination, filters, and sorting

patch.summary: Update order status and/or payment status

discountAmount.description: Discount amount (optional - will recalculate final_amount if updated)

shippingCharges.description: Shipping/delivery charges (optional - will recalculate final_amount if updated)

finalAmount.description: Final amount after all adjustments (optional - if not provided, will be calculated)

updatedBy.description: User ID who is updating the order (required)

notes.example: Order cancelled due to customer request
notes.description: Optional notes for status change (e.g., cancellation reason)

post.summary: Get detailed order information including items, discounts, customer, and address

orderId.description: Order ID to fetch details for

post.summary: Send OTP to SMS for user (creates user if new mobile number)
Verify OTP sent via SMS and login user

200.description: OTP verified successfully, user logged in

message.example: OTP verified successfully. User logged in.

images.description: Multiple product image files (optional, max 3 images per product)

variants.description: JSON string array of variant objects (REQUIRED - at least one variant). Each variant must include: variantName (required), description (optional), nutritional (optional), price (required), sellingPrice (required), quantity (required), itemsPerUnit (optional), units (optional), itemQuantity (optional), itemUnit (optional), expiryDate (required), status (optional), comboDiscounts (optional array). Each comboDiscount object includes: comboQuantity (required), discountType (required: PERCENT or OFFER), discountValue (required), startDate (required), endDate (required), status (optional)

post.summary: Get products with pagination and filters

updatedBy.description: User ID who is updating the product (required)

images.description: Multiple product image files (optional, max 3 images per product)

variants.description: JSON string array of variant objects (optional). For updates include id and concurrencyStamp. For new omit id. Each variant must include: variantName (required), description (optional), nutritional (optional), price (required), sellingPrice (required), quantity (required), itemsPerUnit (optional), units (optional), itemQuantity (optional), itemUnit (optional), expiryDate (required), status (optional), comboDiscounts (optional array). For comboDiscounts: include id and concurrencyStamp for updates, omit id for creates, set deleted:true for deletes. At least one variant must remain after all operations.

variantIdsToDelete.description: JSON string array of variant IDs to delete (optional). Example: '[2,3]'. Note: At least one variant must remain after deletion.

imagesData.description: JSON string array of image objects (optional). For updates include id and concurrencyStamp. For new include imageUrl. Each image can include: id (optional for updates), imageUrl (required for new), isDefault (optional), displayOrder (optional), variantId (optional), status (optional), concurrencyStamp (required for updates)

imageIdsToDelete.description: JSON string array of image IDs to delete (optional). Example: '[4,5]'

post.summary: Get product variants with pagination and filtering

get.summary: Get product variants grouped by type

post.summary: Register or update FCM token for rider

get.summary: Get current rider's FCM token information

post.summary: Fast serviceability check using Haversine distance
Find nearby branches using Haversine distance
Calculate shipping charges using road-distance API (cached) with Haversine fallback.
post.description: Use this endpoint to show shipping charges to customers before they place an order.

addressId.description: Optional - Saved address ID. If provided, latitude and longitude will be fetched from the address. Either addressId or (latitude and longitude) must be provided.

latitude.description: Optional - Address latitude. Required if addressId is not provided. Must be provided together with longitude.

longitude.description: Optional - Address longitude. Required if addressId is not provided. Must be provided together with latitude.

orderAmount.description: Total order amount (used to determine if shipping is free based on thresholds)

deliveryType.description: Delivery type - SAME_DAY for express/urgent orders, NEXT_DAY for normal orders

shippingCharges.description: Calculated shipping charges in currency units

eta.description: Estimated delivery time in minutes (from road-distance API, if available)

400.description: Validation error - Either addressId OR (latitude and longitude) must be provided

404.description: Address not found or does not belong to the user

post.summary: Save or update branch shipping configuration (VENDOR_ADMIN only)

withinThresholdBaseCharge.description: Base shipping charge for orders within threshold distance

withinThresholdFreeAbove.description: Order amount above which shipping is free within threshold distance

aboveThresholdSamedayBaseCharge.description: Base shipping charge for same-day delivery above threshold distance

aboveThresholdSamedayDiscountedCharge.description: Discounted shipping charge for same-day delivery above threshold

aboveThresholdSamedayFreeAbove.description: Order amount above which same-day shipping is free above threshold distance

aboveThresholdNextdayBaseCharge.description: Base shipping charge for next-day delivery above threshold distance

aboveThresholdNextdayFreeAbove.description: Order amount above which next-day shipping is free above threshold distance

post.summary: Get subcategories by category ID with pagination

products_count.description: Number of active products in this subcategory

updatedBy.description: User ID who is updating the subcategory

post.summary: Authentication login with email and password (similar to OTP verification)

400.description: Validation error or vendor already has an admin

post.summary: Convert a user to rider role (Vendor Admin only)

userId.description: User ID to convert to rider

400.description: Validation error or user is already a rider

403.description: Access denied. Vendor admin role required.

post.summary: Refresh access token using old token
Get users filtered by vendor and role
post.description: Vendor ID is automatically extracted from the JWT token. Only users belonging to the vendor in the token will be returned.

parameters.name: tab
parameters.description: Role name to filter users (e.g., ADMIN, RIDER, VENDOR_ADMIN). If not provided, returns all users for the vendor.

filters.description: Array of filter objects to filter user data

key.description: Field name to filter on (e.g., name, email, mobileNumber, status)

in.description: Filter where value is in array

gte.description: Filter where value greater than or equal

lte.description: Filter where value less than or equal

key.description: Field name to sort by (e.g., createdAt, name, email)

totalCount.description: Total count of filtered records. null when pageNumber > 1

paginationEnabled.description: Whether pagination is enabled (true if totalCount > pageSize or pageNumber > 1)

400.description: Validation error or role not found

post.summary: Logout user and close all socket connections

disconnectedSockets.description: Number of socket connections that were disconnected

post.summary: Create a new vendor with branch

400.description: Bad request - validation error or duplicate code

get.summary: Get vendor details by code (Public API)

400.description: Validation error or item already in wishlist

createdBy.description: User ID who created the wishlist items (required)
